This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with prostate cancer that has spread to the bone, testing the effectiveness of docetaxel, zd4054, and placebo drugs in combination with surgical or medical castration treatment.

This phase 3 trial is testing the drug ngx-4010 for the treatment of postherpetic neuralgia (PHN), a type of chronic pain that occurs after shingles, and the eligibility criteria include having a diagnosis of PHN, intact skin over the painful area, and being on a stable regimen of chronic pain medications.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with chronic hepatitis C who have not responded to previous therapy with PEGinterferon alpha plus ribavirin. The study aims to evaluate the efficacy of ribavirin and placebo in combination with other eligibility criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the effectiveness of sitagliptin phosphate, glimepiride, and placebos, while excluding patients with certain medical conditions and previous use of specific medications.
This sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of b-cell lymphoma using drugs such as bevacizumab, rituximab, chop, and placebo, with specific eligibility criteria for inclusion and exclusion.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for allergic rhinitis, testing the effectiveness of bdp nasal aerosol and placebo in children aged 4 to 11 years, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.
This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of benign prostatic hyperplasia using the drugs tadalafil and placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This phase 3 clinical trial is focused on patients with locally advanced adenocarcinoma of the prostate, and it aims to evaluate the effectiveness of multiple drugs including bicalutamide, buserelin, flutamide, goserelin, leuprolide acetate, and nilutamide in combination with wide-field pelvic irradiation. The eligibility criteria include specific disease characteristics, patient characteristics, and prior concurrent therapy restrictions.
This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for cystic fibrosis patients, testing the effectiveness of mannitol and placebo drugs on lung function, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with schizophrenia, testing the effectiveness of quetiapine fumarate as a treatment option. The inclusion criteria include patients with a clinical diagnosis of schizophrenia who are able to provide informed consent and comply with the study requirements. Exclusion criteria include patients with a history of non-compliance, lack of response to previous quetiapine treatment, recent participation in another drug study, or previous participation in this specific study.

This phase 3 trial is testing the drugs exemestane, tamoxifen, and triptorelin in patients with histologically confirmed breast cancer that has been completely resected, with eligibility criteria including hormone receptor positivity and no distant metastases.
This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of prostate cancer using leuprorelin acetate, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for the treatment of bacterial pneumonia, testing the effectiveness of ceftaroline fosamil for injection, iv ceftriaxone, placebo, and clarithromycin, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for subjects.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) who have failed one or two prior chemotherapy regimens. The study will test the effectiveness of vandetanib and erlotinib as potential treatments for NSCLC.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with refractory epilepsy and seizures, testing the effectiveness of the drug retigabine compared to a placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participation in the study.

This sample is a phase 2/phase 3 trial for patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), testing the effectiveness of drugs such as indacaterol, formoterol, and tiotropium, as well as placebos, in improving lung function. The study has specific inclusion and exclusion criteria, including age, smoking history, lung function measurements, and the absence of certain medical conditions.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with previously untreated diffuse large B-cell lymphoma or follicular non-Hodgkin lymphoma, testing the efficacy of rituximab in combination with CHOP or CVP chemotherapy regimens, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria related to cardiovascular disease and adverse events.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients diagnosed with acute coronary disease, testing the effectiveness of clopidogrel and acetylsalicyclic acid (ASA) in reducing the risk of bleeding and other complications.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with type 2 diabetes, testing the effectiveness of liraglutide, sitagliptin, and metformin in combination with metformin alone, with specific eligibility criteria including HbA1c levels and BMI.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for metastatic colorectal cancer, testing the effectiveness of cediranib, folfox, xelox, and a cediranib placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with prostate cancer, testing the effectiveness of enzalutamide and placebo in treating the disease, with specific eligibility and exclusion criteria outlined.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with atrial fibrillation, testing the effectiveness of vernakalant injection and amiodarone injection in cardioversion, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with metastatic or locally-advanced pancreatic adenocarcinoma, testing the drugs ag-013736, gemcitabine, and placebo, with inclusion criteria including confirmed diagnosis and adequate organ function, and exclusion criteria including prior chemotherapy treatment and inability to take oral medication.
This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the effectiveness of saxagliptin and placebo drugs, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of overactive bladder, testing the drugs propiverine hydrochloride and tolterodine extended-release tablet, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligible participants.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with uncontrolled hypertension on lisinopril monotherapy, testing the combination of carvedilol and valsartan as a potential treatment option. The inclusion criteria include subjects with a 24-hour ambulatory diastolic blood pressure >85 mmHg, while the exclusion criteria include various medical conditions and contraindications.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of budesonide/formoterol (symbicort) and budesonide in treating asthma in children aged 6-15 who have already received treatment with inhaled corticosteroids.
This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for Parkinson's disease and dyskinesia, testing the drugs sarizotan and placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligible subjects.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) and it is testing the effectiveness of two drugs, umeclidinium/vilanterol and tiotropium, in improving lung function and reducing symptoms. The eligibility criteria include being an outpatient, being 40 years or older, having a history of COPD, and having a certain severity of disease.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for participants with inadequately controlled type 2 diabetes mellitus, testing the effectiveness of a new formulation of insulin glargine (hoe901-u300) and comparing it to lantus (insulin glargine). The inclusion and exclusion criteria are also provided.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with acute myeloid leukemia, testing the effectiveness of cytarabine or supportive care and dacogen (decitabine) in treating the disease, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligibility.

This phase 3 trial aims to evaluate the efficacy of bazedoxifene/conjugate estrogens (ce) and raloxifene compared to placebo in generally healthy, postmenopausal women with endometrial hyperplasia and osteoporosis, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for glaucoma and ocular hypertension, testing the effectiveness of two different eye drop solutions (duotrav and cosopt) containing different combinations of drugs (travoprost, timolol, dorzolamide) as treatment options, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with metastatic colorectal cancer, testing the effectiveness of oxaliplatin based chemotherapy, panitumumab, irinotecan based chemotherapy, and bevacizumab, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for chronic hepatitis C, testing the drugs sof, rbv, placebo to match sof, and placebo to match rbv, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for eligible participants.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for the treatment of major depressive disorder using the drug vortioxetine compared to a placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.
This sample is a phase 3 trial for the drug clevudine in patients with hepatitis B, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria outlined for patient eligibility.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with cystic fibrosis and pancreatic exocrine insufficiency, testing the effectiveness of pancrelipase delayed release compared to a placebo comparator, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients undergoing kidney transplantation, testing the drug fty720. The eligibility criteria include age, type of transplantation, and exclusion criteria such as multi-organ transplantation and certain medical conditions.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with rheumatoid arthritis, testing the effectiveness of methotrexate, ocrelizumab, and placebo as treatments, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.
The sample is a phase 3 trial for asthma, testing the drug levocetirizine, with inclusion criteria requiring completion of a previous 18-month treatment period and no exclusion criteria specified.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for patients with unresectable metastatic colorectal cancer, testing the effectiveness of fluorouracil, irinotecan hydrochloride, leucovorin calcium, and oxaliplatin as chemotherapy drugs, with specific eligibility criteria for patients to participate in the trial.

This sample is a phase 3 trial for patients with chronic heart failure, focusing on the effectiveness of olmesartan medoxomil + candesartan cilexetil placebo and olmesartan medoxomil placebo + candesartan cilexetil drugs in reducing symptoms and improving quality of life. The eligibility criteria include age between 18 and 85 years, recent hospital admission with CHF diagnosis, functional NYHA class II-IV with LVEF < 40%, and blood BNP levels > 400 pg/ml or NT-ProBNP levels > 1500 pg/ml.
This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for chronic kidney disease patients on hemodialysis, testing the effectiveness of the drugs asp1585 and sevelamer hydrochloride in treating hyperphosphatemia.

This phase 3 trial is testing the effectiveness of metformin, ly2189265, and placebos in treating type 2 diabetes, with specific eligibility criteria including disease duration, HbA1c levels, BMI, and willingness to perform self-monitoring and self-injection.

The sample is a phase 3 clinical trial for fibromyalgia, testing the effectiveness of the drugs placebo and xyrem® in subjects who meet the American College of Rheumatology diagnostic criteria for fibromyalgia.

This sample is a phase 3 clinical trial testing the effectiveness of valganciclovir, an antiviral drug, in treating patients with Crohn's disease, ulcerative colitis, unclassifiable colitis, or pouchitis who have cytomegalovirus infections. The inclusion criteria include patients needing treatment with corticoids and/or immunosuppressive drugs, and who have had a new attack in the previous three months. Exclusion criteria include serious or complicated attacks, psychiatric diseases, participation in another clinical trial, and other serious diseases.
